title: The Elder Scrolls III Morrowind GOTY repack Mr DJ
description:
LOSSLESS Repack by Mr DJ (Me)
 The Elder Scrolls III Morrowind Game Of The Year repack Mr DJ

 Repack features:

 Do not cut/recoded ;
 Game Version: 1.6.1820 ;
 Crack based on : None (GOG release) ;
 Final size: 1.97gb ;
 Install time : 2 minutes ;
 Working Operating system: Win XP,Win Vista,Win 7,Win 8,Win 8.1 (both 32bit and 64bit);
 Language : English ;

 DLC Included :

 Siege at Firemoth 
 Adamantium Armor
 Area Effect Arrows
 Entertainers
 Bitter Coast Sounds
 Helm of Tohan
 Master Index
 LeFemm Armor
 Tribunal
 Bloodmoon

 Please enable them through the 'Data Files' option in the launcher ...

 Game Guide and Manual included ....

 **INSTALL INSTRUCTIONS:

 DISABLE YOUR ANTIVIRUS BEFORE RUNNING 'Setup.exe' (IMPORTANT) , same for uninstall.....(For avast users: Disable DeepScreen in antivirus settings)...

 After running setup,, click on 'Configure',, specify the install directory,, click on next and next,, select the necessary software (Direct X [provided in Redist folder]),, again next,, finally on 'Install'...PLAY THE GAME FROM DESKTOP SHORTCUT using run as administrator.... 

 Check out my Official FB page for any help :
Mr DJ repacks
 Like it guys to support and get updates on upcoming repacks, gaming tips and requests
